reference.title: General Description
reference.shortdesc: The Mitchell medium bomber is a high-speed, mid-wing land monoplane.

section.p: Positive dihedral in the inner and negative dihedral in the outer wing panels give the plane a gull-wing appearance, while adding control and maneuverability.
A twin tail section with large rudders increases stability and maneuverability and allows a greater concentration of firepower to the rear.
